subject: Pro X Ultra Elastomer Issue
description_text:
Hello,

I’ve had my pedals for a month and just noticed the largest red elastomer
is breaking apart. I’m currently using a max of 35kg in the pedal
configuration.

I’ve attached a photo. Is it possible that to get replacement?

conversations.body_text: Hi Chris Ayers,  Please provide your order number, contact person, shipping address, and phone number. We will send you a replacement set of three red dampers. We recommend trying the yellow dampers for better performance. If you want to increase the pedal travel, you can remove the 10mm spacer inside the black brake spring.

Hello,

I appreciate the response. I've put the yellows on for now and will have to
try removing the spacer to increase the travel distance to try and get it
similar to the reds. The order was placed on Amazon (Order#:
111-9125223-885465).

Chris Ayers
131 Goethals Dr, Rochester, NY 14616
+1-585-705-5769

On Sat, Dec 20, 2025 at 8:12 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Chris Ayers,  We have sent you a new replacement. The tracking number is SF6047230788684. The shipping carrier is SF Express. You can track it via https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill
